channel.title: Barrows disconnect?
channel.description: Okay, so whenever you click on the casket where the barrows brothers is after you dig down, it DC's you and in the servers' CMD it says: "java.lang.NullPointException", I don't get it..?

either way id just give him what to do but thts jut me :> but idk anything bout nulls only if you tke a config file out itll null other than that never ran into the prob

item.title: Barrows disconnect?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I don’t understand what the problem is, Marine was providing an example. There is nothing wrong with that, if you have issues with each other then use the PM system.

item.title: Barrows disconnect?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

emtrescue:

marine your not helping all your doing is saying nananan i know what to do and you dont. your actually being an ass

Really? I actually wrote this

As the rules say, this isn't a spoon feeding community, figure it out. Look at the example I gave and then look at the last thing you

edited.

That seems kind of different than what you said I said. Go ahead and read the rules.

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Keep posting and break rule #4.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows disconnect?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“ApocalypseX, post:3, topic:400165”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=497248.msg3636010#msg3636010 date=1308603336]
This happens when you try to use an object reference who’s value is null. Example

Object object = null; object.notify(); // Would throw NullPointerException as the object to which object points is null.

Always look in the compiling stickies at the top.
[/quote]
And… That helps me how? :/[/quote]

As the rules say, this isn’t a spoon feeding community, figure it out. Look at the example I gave and then look at the last thing you

edited.

Read full topic
